Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Pah. This is what Miss Luna had in mind?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'She can\'t get it through to "her", so she\'s picking on some weakling who has ties to her?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Miss Luna willed it. We need only follow.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "...Oh whatever. It's not my first day with you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Yeah, yeah. We have him. Guy knows how to squirm and hide.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "An NA-branch underground bunker of the World Government—that's where the guy's holed up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'The rathole was built with ballistic missiles in mind. So, naturally, the Corrupted would have a hard time scouring for him.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "So what's the plan? We waltz right in and blow the place to pieces?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Wait. I'll go check around the place first.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Though all agents might have different personal interests, we are all chosen by the network to act as its proxy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: "In other words, we serve to realize the network's will.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'And for this, we need a common belief, a common flag... One that unites all of us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'A flag without binding power is like a castle in the sky... Utterly worthless.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Which is why I told you to not meet Miss Luna with such impudence.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Hmmmph. I see where you're coming from now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'But Miss Luna... What does she really want?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'She has never changed. She wishes to filter out the new humans for the new world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'There is no need to discuss what comes after that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'We only know that, Miss Luna can grant us the power to... "filter" through those that wish to join the network.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'If they maintain their ego in this filtering... they become an Ascendant.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "And if they don't, they end up like the brainless drones over there.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Roland gestures at the Corrupted afar, mechanically exacting orders.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'You must have thought of it before.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "You'll handle the tracking after this, then, yeah?", 4: '1'}
